participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys quiet moments and appreciates the beauty of nature.
participant_1.background: I am partly deaf. I have a big library at home. I grow roses in my garden. I love to drink fancy tea.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and competitive, loves engaging in discussions about sports and technology.
participant_2.background: I enjoy american sports. I work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. I am a male. I have a children and a dogs.
